testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #deplyment Should set the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE to publisher account, set MANAGER_ROLE to the specified manager, and set MANAGER_ROLE as TEAM_ROLE's admin
testcase.classname: Should set the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE to publisher account, set MANAGER_ROLE to the specified manager, and set MANAGER_ROLE as TEAM_ROLE's admin

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #balanceOf Should return balanceOf multi NTT owner
testcase.classname: Should return balanceOf multi NTT owner

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #balanceOf Should return balanceOf only one NTT owner
testcase.classname: Should return balanceOf only one NTT owner

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #balanceOf Should return balanceOf account without NTT
testcase.classname: Should return balanceOf account without NTT

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #balanceOf Should revert if gets balance of a zero address holder
testcase.classname: Should revert if gets balance of a zero address holder

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #mint Should mint a credential ID that was not minted yet
testcase.classname: Should mint a credential ID that was not minted yet

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #mint Should revert if mint to a zero address holder
testcase.classname: Should revert if mint to a zero address holder

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #mint Should revert if mint a credential ID already minted to the same address
testcase.classname: Should revert if mint a credential ID already minted to the same address

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #mint Should revert if mint a credential ID already minted to another address
testcase.classname: Should revert if mint a credential ID already minted to another address

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #mint Should revert if an non TEAM_ROLE account mint a credential ID
testcase.classname: Should revert if an non TEAM_ROLE account mint a credential ID

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #ownerOf Should return ownerOf NTT
testcase.classname: Should return ownerOf NTT

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #ownerOf Should revert if get ownerOf inexistent credentialID
testcase.classname: Should revert if get ownerOf inexistent credentialID

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #getCredential Should return NTT Credential
testcase.classname: Should return NTT Credential

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #getCredential Should return revoked NTT Credential
testcase.classname: Should return revoked NTT Credential

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #getCredential Should revert if get inexistent Credential
testcase.classname: Should revert if get inexistent Credential

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #revoke Should revoke an existing not revoked credential ID
testcase.classname: Should revoke an existing not revoked credential ID

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #revoke Should revert if revoke an inexistent Credential
testcase.classname: Should revert if revoke an inexistent Credential

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #revoke Should revert if revoke a credential ID already revoked
testcase.classname: Should revert if revoke a credential ID already revoked

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #revoke Should revert if an non TEAM_ROLE account revoke a credential ID
testcase.classname: Should revert if an non TEAM_ROLE account revoke a credential ID

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #isValid Should return isValid = TRUE if credential not revoked
testcase.classname: Should return isValid = TRUE if credential not revoked

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #isValid Should return isValid = FALSE if credential revoked
testcase.classname: Should return isValid = FALSE if credential revoked

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #isValid Should revert if inexistent credentialID
testcase.classname: Should revert if inexistent credentialID

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #hasValid Should return hasValid = TRUE if holder has only one and valid credential
testcase.classname: Should return hasValid = TRUE if holder has only one and valid credential

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #hasValid Should return hasValid = TRUE if holder has revoked, expired and valid credentials
testcase.classname: Should return hasValid = TRUE if holder has revoked, expired and valid credentials

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #hasValid Should return hasValid = FALSE if holder has only revoked and expired credentials
testcase.classname: Should return hasValid = FALSE if holder has only revoked and expired credentials

testcase.name: Integration tests Passport NTT #hasValid Should return hasValid = FALSE if holder has no credentials
testcase.classname: Should return hasValid = FALSE if holder has no credentials
